title: Interesting Or Not
description: Interesting Or Not is a newsletter platform that lets writers focus on what they do best - writing - while we take care of the rest. Think YouTube, but for writing. Writers get a user-friendly content management system to create stunning content, a guaranteed spot in our weekly newsletter, AI-powered distribution to reach their most engaged readers, and easy, automatic, monetisation through Stripe. It’s everything writers need to share their work, find their audience, and earn - effortlessly.
